Title: Learn To Ride
Description: It's time for you to learn how to ride! Seek out Kar Stormsinger in Mulgore's Bloodhoof Village. Don't forget to buy your mount while you are there!
PortraitGiverText: Find Kar and learn how to ride a mount!
RewardText: Don't forget to buy your mount while you are here! You can buy one from Harb Clawhoof over there.
